maqras.text: 80|1|keat( mou ham meat) ban thveumoukh kranhouv  haey ngeak moukh chenh
80|2|piproh mean chn pikear phnek mneak ban chaul mk chuob keat .
80|3|tae anak( mou ham meat) ach doeng yeang dau me  d ch ban? chuonkal  ke ach mk saamatakhluon .
80|4|ryyka ke chngban kar kraenromluk haey kar kraenromluk noh  ach phdal phalobrayoch dl ke  .
80|5|rie anak del meanotropy sa mb tde krobkrean ( min trauvkar  kar changaoulobangheanh pi anak)
80|6|anak bercha yk chetd toukdeak champoh ke towvinh .
80|7|haey mean banhhea avei champoh anak( mou ham meat)  brasenbae ke saamatakhluon ( pi pheap kmean chomnue) noh
80|8|chamnek e anak del ban mk chuob anak daembi som kar changaoul  bangheanh phlauv la
80|9|haey ke kaotakhlach a l laoh noh
80|10|anak bercha prongeuy k ndeu y champoh ke towvinh .
80|11|chaur anak kom thveu bebnih .  pitabrakd nasa  vea(ayeat  teangnih) kuchea kar kraenromluk .
80|12|dau che  neah anaknea haey meanbamnng  ke pitchea nung yk vea ( kompir kuor an) thveuchea merien .
80|13|del mean nowknong kompir del trauv ban ke leukatamkeung .
80|14|brakabdaoy pheap khpangkhpasa  promteang chreah saat .
80|15|del now nung dai anak del sarser sar( mea la ai kat)
80|16|da laobrapei  ning chea anak brate b tde tam a l laoh yeang  khchabkhchuon .
80|17|mnoussa lok trauv ban ke dakbandasa nouv avei delke ban  brachheang nung mcheasa robsa ke  .
80|18|tae trong ban bangkeut ke( anak brachheang) ampi avei
80|19|trong ban b ngki t ke ampi tukkeam  ruoch trong ban kamnt aoy ke  ruoch chea se  rch ( thngai slab leaphosakkar  veasanea...) .
80|20|banteabmk  trong ban samruol phlauv dl ke .
80|21|kraoyomk  trong thveu aoy ke slab  ruoch dak ke nowknong phnaur .
80|22|kraoyomk tiet  nowpel del trong mean chetnea trong  nung thveu aoy ke rsa laengvinh .
80|23|te.  ke min anouvotd tam avei del trong ban banhchea ke laey .
80|24|dau che  neah  chaur aoy mnoussa lok meul towkean chamneiahar  robsa ke choh .
80|25|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchouh tukaphlieng mk yeang  chraen .
80|26|banteabmk yeung ban bambek dei chea bamnek  .
80|27|ruoch yeung ban b no  dah thonhnhocheate krob braphet now leu vea .
80|28|ning daem tompeangbaychour  ning banle .
80|29|ning daem au liv  ning daem leu  m .
80|30|ning suonutyean del mean daemchheu thom  cheachraen .
80|31|ning phleanouphl  haeyning roukkhcheate samreab satvapahn
80|32|chea phalobrayoch samreab puok anak ning satvapahn robsa  puok anak .
80|33|haey nowpel del samrek( kar phlomtre leuk tipir)  yeang khlang ban mokadl .
80|34|now thngai del mnoussa rtkech chenhpi bangobaaun robsa ke .
80|35|ning mdeay robsa ke  ning aupouk robsa ke .
80|36|ning braponth robsa ke  ning kaunchaw robsa ke .
80|37|champoh bokkol mnea k knongchamnaom puokke now thngai noh  ku kittepi khluoneng bonnaoh .
80|38|tukmoukh( robsa anak mean chomnue) now thngai noh ku mean pheap  rikreay .
80|39|saech sabbayrikreay( champoh damnoengola sdeipi thansuokr) .
80|40|haey tukmoukh( robsa anak kmean chomnue) now thngai noh  ku braleak thouli .
80|41|pheap khmaw ngngut krobadandab phtaimoukh( robsa puokke) .
80|42|puok teangnoh haey  kuchea puok kmean chomnue del br pru td  ampeuaeakrak bamphot .
81|1|nowpel del preahatity trauv ban ke thveu aoy bat rosmei .
81|2|ning nowpel del hvaung phkay ban thleak bakbek .
81|3|ning nowpel del phnom trauv ban ke thveu aoy rsat dauch thouli .
81|4|ning nowpel del satv audth meanophtaipoh trauv ban ke baohbng  chaol .
81|5|ning nowpel del satv sahav trauv ban ke bramoulophdom .
81|6|ning nowpel del tukasamoutr trauv ban ke thveu aoy cheh chea  andataphleung .
81|7|ning nowpel del prolung trauv ban ke banhchoul tow knong khluon  robsa ke vinh .
81|8|ning nowpel tearikea delke ban kb teang rsa trauv ban ke  suor tha
81|9|daoysaar babakamm ei  v ban chea neang trauv ban ke samleab
81|10|ning nowpel del sievphow kamntheto(ampeula ning  ampeuaeakrak) trauv ban ke leatatradeang .
81|11|ning nowpel del mekh trauv ban ke yk chenhpi kanleng  robsa vea .
81|12|ning nowpel del phleung nork cheu hi m trauv ban ke thveu aoy cheh  yeang santhosanthow .
81|13|ning nowpel del thansuokr trauv ban ke dak aoy now chit ( anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh)  .
81|14|( pelnoh) bokkol krobroub nung doeng ampi avei delke ban  br pru td kanlongomk .
81|15|chea karpit nasa  yeung sbath nung hvaung phkay del lich bat .
81|16|ning hau  v ng phkay del daertamokonlong robsa vea yeang luen ruoch  ka lich bat .
81|17|ning peloyb  nowpel del vea mokadl ti b pea  ch b .
81|18|ning pel prolum  nowpel del vea b po  ch nh ponlu .
81|19|pitabrakd nasa  kompir kuor an ku neamk tamory peaky  saamdei robsa anakneasar( chi pri l) da thkomthkaeng
81|20|del mean anoupheap khlangokla( knong karottuolkhosatrauv leu  karngear)  ning mean than khpangkhpasa champoh mcheasa nei a r sh
81|21|del chea anak trauv ke korp now tinoh  ning chea anak smaohtrang .
81|22|haey mi td robsa puok anak( mou ham meat) minmen chea  mnoussaavikl chrit laey .
81|23|haey chea karpit nasa  keat( mou ham meat) bankheunh ke ( chi pri l) yeang chbasa now e cheungmekh .
81|24|haey ke( mou ham meat) min kamnanh leu kar phsaapvophsaeay  brakear athrkambang( sar robsa a l laoh) laey .
81|25|haey kompir kuor an ka minmen chea peakyasaamdei robsa shai tn  del trauv ke dakbandasa der .
81|26|hetonih  tae sate robsa puok del bdeseth nung kompir kuor an  townea asahaey
81|27|vea( kompir kuor an)  kmeanoavei krawpi kar romluk dl piphp teang  asanoh laey .
81|28|samreab anaknea del mean bamnng chng daer leu meakra da troem  trauv knongchamnaom puok anak .
81|29|haey puok anak min ach mean bamnng thveuavei muoy ban laey  leuklengte a l laoh del chea mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa  mean chetnea bonnaoh .
